author: sarowe
msg: maven config: upgrade maven-bundle-plugin from 2.3.7 & 2.4.0 to 2.5.3, to allow the bundle-manifest goal either to succeed or to obey the skip configuration - this was causing java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 18 (merged trunk r1672474)
